text.title: Ten killed in helicopter crash in Argentina, French Olympians among the dead
text.head: Ten killed in helicopter crash in Argentina, French Olympians among the dead
Sources

list.item: Eliana Raszewski, Mark John. "France mourns sports stars killed in Argentina helicopter crash" — Reuters , March 10, 2015
